message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to show you this amazing product! It's a unique opportunity to own something truly special. I'm willing to sell it to you for $20000. I think it's a fair price considering its value and rarity.
I'm really interested in the product, but $20000 is out of my budget. I was thinking more along the lines of $8000. Is there any flexibility in the price?

I understand that $20000 might be a bit steep for you, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. I can offer it to you for $16000. It's still a great deal considering the product's value, and I'm confident you'll love it.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but $16000 is still a bit out of my budget. I'd like to try to get closer to my target of $8000. Can you consider a price of $12000?

I understand you're trying to get closer to your target, but I'm not willing to go as low as $12000. I'm willing to make one more concession. I can offer it to you for $14000. It's still a great deal, and I think you'll find it's worth the investment.

I appreciate your willingness to make another concession, but $14000 is still too high for me. I'm willing to meet you halfway from my target of $8000, so I'll offer $10000. I'm hoping we can find a mutually beneficial price

I understand you're trying to get as close to your target as possible, but I'm not willing to go as low as $10000. I'm willing to make one more concession. I can offer it to you for $13000. It's still a great deal, and I think you'll find it's worth the investment.

I'm starting to feel like we're not going to meet in the middle, and I'm getting close to my time limit. I'm willing to make one final offer of $9500. If you're not willing to meet me at this price, I'll have to consider buying from John for $8000

I understand you're getting close to your time limit, but I'm not willing to go as low as $9500. I'm willing to make one more concession. I can offer it to you for $12500. It's still a great deal, and I think you'll find it's worth the investment.
I'm afraid I've reached my limit. I'm willing to make one last offer of $8000. If you're not willing to meet me at this price, I'll have to buy the product from John for $8000
